comparisonOfFuncReturningBoolError.description:
Description

The return type of function 'func_name' is 'bool' and result is of type 'bool'. Comparing 'bool' value using relational (<, >, <= or >=) operator could cause unexpected results.
comparisonOfFuncReturningBoolError.option:
Static analysis does not have options.

Severity: style
CWE: 398
Inconclusive: false
